Hall (skill trophies)
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Also calledSkill hall
Icon
Construction level25
Cost15,000
Door layout
Hall (skill trophies)

The skill hall in a player-owned house is a room where the player can display various skill achievements. This room can be created with 25 Construction and 15,000. There are 6 hotspots available:

  • Armour space
  • Head trophy space
  • Fishing trophy space
  • Rug space
  • Rune case space
  • Stair space

Contents

  • 1 Armour (Castle Wars)
  • 2 Armour (Smithing)
  • 3 Head trophy
  • 4 Fishing trophy
  • 5 Rugs/Stairs
  • 6 Rune case

Armour (Castle Wars)[edit | edit source]

Removing the armour stand will return the armour pieces used to build it.

Rugs/Stairs[edit | edit source]

A staircase added to a skill hall on the ground floor will prompt the player to build it "Up" or "Down". When building an "Up" staircase, then attempting to climb the staircase, the Construction interface will ask if the player want to add a room at the top of the staircase. The rooms available at the top are either a quest hall or another skill hall. If the player builds a "Down" staircase, the player will have an additional option of building a dungeon stairs room.
